#summary Tips for developing and debugging and a chess AI

= Introduction =

Developing your chess AI will be challenging. Here is a list of useful tips and trick to help you in your coding.

* Create FEN boards

In order to test certain situations, you will want to avoid the repetitive playing just to get to a certain state. You can create a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forsyth-Edwards_Notation FEN board] that will describe the layout of the chess pieces, and whose turn it is.
